definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
(bird species of China) Indian golden oriole (Oriolus kundoo)
(bird species of China) Eurasian golden oriole (Oriolus oriolus)

sentences.english: The cold overall tone in the image is brilliantly accompanied by the golden in the grass and on the towers.
sentences.chinese: 画中整体的冷色调连同金黄的草与塔尖，堪称完美。

sentences.english: Golden, with a very fine cordon of bubbles.
sentences.chinese: 金黄色的酒液，还有精致的小气泡。

sentences.english: A gold-yellow color with nose of white flowers and apricot note.
sentences.chinese: 亮丽的金黄色色泽，带有白色花系银杏的芳香。

sentences.english: Heat wok with oil, deep-fry drumsticks until golden, dish up and drain excess oil, set aside.
sentences.chinese: 烧热油镬，下鸡槌炸至金黄，盛起隔油备用。

sentences.english: Toast walnut kernels in medium hot oven, remove and cool.
sentences.chinese: 合桃肉放焗炉内，用中火焗至金黄，取出待冻。

sentences.english: The color gold is said to bring wealth, and the color red is considered especially lucky.
sentences.chinese: 金黄色象征着财源广进，红色被认为是特别吉利。

sentences.english: Bake for 20 minutes or until golden and crisp. Transfer them onto a wire rack to cool.
sentences.chinese: 烘焙20分钟或是直到金黄酥松，放到架上晾凉。

sentences.english: Deep-fry the spring rolls until golden.
Or dry fry (without any oil) in a non-stick skillet until browned and slightly crisp.
sentences.chinese: 抑或烧热不沾锅，无油将其炒至金黄香脆。

sentences.english: Heat up a skillet with some oil. Add in pine nuts and stir-fry until lightly golden.
sentences.chinese: 烧热锅入少许油，将松仁炒成金黄色，滤油。

sentences.english: All his attention was fixed on this golden prospect.
sentences.chinese: 他全神注视着这片金黄色的景色。

sentences.english: We looked at the tower the spire of which was golden.
sentences.chinese: 我们望着塔尖是金黄色的那座塔。

sentences.english: Deep-fry chicken wings in hot oil until golden yellow and done.
sentences.chinese: 将鸡翼放入热油中炸至金黄熟透。

sentences.english: Heat wok with oil, put in chicken wings and fry until golden.
sentences.chinese: 烧热油镬，放入鸡翼煎至金黄。

sentences.english: Conclusion The Yutian Kechuan capsule has certain of antibacterial effects on staphylococcus aureus.
sentences.chinese: 结论蝓天克喘胶囊对金黄色葡萄球菌有一定抗菌作用。
